document.full_text: cuban economy minister marino murillo has been replaced by his top deputy so he can concentrate on overseeing economic reforms expected to be approved at an upcoming communist party conference, the cuban government said on friday.
document.title: cuba economy minister replaced, to focus on reform
lines_and_colors: cuban economy minister marino murillo has been replaced by his top deputy so he can concentrate on overseeing economic reforms expected to be approved at an upcoming communist party conference, the cuban government said on friday.
